summary: "Aladdin" is a popular Disney animated movie from 1992. It's about a poor boy who finds a magic lamp with a genie inside. Aladdin pretends to be a prince to win the heart of Princess Jasmine, while a bad guy named Jafar tries to steal the lamp. The film is based on an old Arabic story. It was a big hit, making lots of money and winning awards for its songs. It even inspired a Broadway show and a live-action movie. Robin Williams' funny voice for the genie is one of the things that made the movie so memorable.
title: Aladdin (1992 Disney film)
